title: Just a thought for URF
body:
Just a quick thought for URF if (when) it comes back.

I hope that this time Riot will remember to remove HEALTH costs on abilities. Last time, I tried Vlad and Morde and my abilities were draining my HP faster then my opponent's damage. It was basically a feeding mechanic, couldn't do anything as those champs. And I bet it would be the same for other HP-cost champs too (Mundo, Zac).

replies.body:
Mundo Ult on 80% CDR and no health Cost.

GG.

Yea... maybe Mundo will end up being like Ryze and Kassadin; perma-banned.

Even so, for Vlad, Morde and Zac's sake I say it's worth it.
